wmndsDisruptionIndicatorSmallProps.name: iconRight
wmndsDisruptionIndicatorSmallProps.description: Type of the button. As default it is null. Available types: link, primary, secondary, destructive, start, mode

wmndsDisruptionIndicatorSmallProps.name: classes
